input: Send a batch request to get borrower change requests completed on 2017-04-13 and create a new change request for loan UUID 12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef with reason code 2.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /LoanContractBorrowerPartyChangeRequests?$filter=CompletionDate eq 2017-04-13 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

POST /LoanContractBorrowerPartyChangeRequests HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"LoanContractUUID": "12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef", "ReasonCode": "2"}

--request-separator--
